front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Application of Neutral Grounding in Electrical Utility Systems, Part VI - Systems Supplied by Current-Regulated Sources
front.abstract: Applications to three-phase electrical utility systems are described in this Part VI of the IEEE C62.92â„¢ series. Definitions and considerations related to system grounding where the dominant sources of system energization are current-regulated or power-regulated power conversion devices are provided.
